bug.author: CraigChaffee
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: 2.0.0 Describe the bug The bootstrap script doesn't work on the latest EMR.
integration/emr/alluxio-emr.sh:14 should be if [ -z "$MASTER" ] After fixing the above there's still a permission error in task.log for the formatWorker step. "Permission denied (publickey)." The comments in the file refer to a preview version that is 404.
To Reproduce Deploy the latest version of EMR and Alluxio 2.0.0 per the documentation.

comments.comment: Hi Craig, thanks for reporting this! <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ns1123>@ns1123</denchmark-link> can you take a look when you have the time.

Resolved with <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Alluxio/alluxio/pull/9467>#9467</denchmark-link> . The issues with previous script were
curl version change : different return code were seen. Now switched to Alluxio shell script directly to coordinate the start of Master and Workers Stop using monitor when launching
